Title: National Theatre Live: Les Liaisons Dangereuses
Actors: Janet McTeer, Morfydd Clark, Adjoa Andoh, Dominic West
Plot: Marquise de Merteuil, former lover of Vicomte de Valmont, incites him to corrupt the innocent Cecile de Volanges before her wedding night, but Valmont has targeted the peerlessly virtuous and beautiful Madame de Tourvel.
